Returns:
String - everything that was skipped.

skipTo

public java.lang.String skipTo(char[] chs)
Skips everything up to the first occurance of any of the characters in chs and returns everything that was skipped.
Returns:
String - everthing that was skipped.

skipTo_widthin_nonNestedScope

public java.lang.String skipTo_widthin_nonNestedScope(char separator)
Moves to the first occurance of 'separator' or to the end of the scope (which is recognised by '']' or '')'. Moves past any skopes that are nested within the current scope. Scopes are started by '(' or '[' and ended by ')' or ']'.
Parameters:
separator - the character to stop at.
Returns:
String - the String that the lexer moved past.

skipWhiteSpace

public void skipWhiteSpace()
Moves past an arbitrary-length sequence of space-characters ' '.
